headline: Coming Soon: Boost Bonus Days
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced the return of Boost Bonus Days, a mega-sales event giving Boost by Kroger Plus members exclusive access to even more benefits offered through their membership from July 16-July 29.
